00029 // inertia tensor 
00030 
00031 static void ob_inertia(const double* Xcm,
00032                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00033                        const GaussianAux* X, complex double T[9])
00034 {
00035   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00036   int i,j;
00037 
00038   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00039     rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i]);
00040 
00041   for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00042     for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00043       T[i+j*3] -= (X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00044       if (i==j) T[i+j*3] += (2*X->alpha + rho2cm)*X->Q;
00045     } 
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 void calcInertiaTensor(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00050                        double T[9])
00051 {
00052   double Xcm[3];
00053   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00054 
00055   OneBodyOperator op_ob_inertia = { dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_inertia};
00056   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_inertia, T);
00057 }

00059 
00060 // octupole tensor
00061 
00062 static void ob_octupole(const double* Xcm,
00063                         const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00064                         const GaussianAux* X, 
00065                         complex double o[27])
00066 {
00067   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00068   int i,j,k;
00069 
00070   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00071     rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i] - Xcm[i]);
00072 
00073   for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00074     for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00075       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00076         o[i+j*3+k*9] += 
00077           5*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*(X->rho[k]-Xcm[k])*X->Q;
00078 
00079         if (i==j) o[i+j*3+k*9] += - rho2cm* (X->rho[k]-Xcm[k])* X->Q; 
00080         if (j==k) o[i+j*3+k*9] += - rho2cm* (X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])* X->Q; 
00081         if (k==i) o[i+j*3+k*9] += - rho2cm* (X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])* X->Q; 
00082       }
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 void calcOctupoleTensor(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00087                       double O[27])
00088 {
00089   double Xcm[3];
00090   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00091 
00092   OneBodyOperator op_ob_octupole = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_octupole};
00093 
00094   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_octupole, O);
00095 }

00098 static void RotationMatrixToEulerAngles(double R[3][3], 
00099                                         double* a, double* b, double* c)
00100 {
00101   const double eps=10.e-10;
00102   double arg;
00103 
00104   if (fabs(R[2][0]) < eps && fabs(R[2][1]) < eps) {
00105     *a = atan2(R[0][1], R[0][0]);
00106     arg = R[2][2];
00107     if (arg > 1.0) arg=1.0;
00108     if (arg < -1.0) arg=-1.0;
00109     *b = acos(arg);
00110     *c = 0.0;
00111   } else {
00112     *a = atan2(R[2][1], R[2][0]);
00113     arg = R[2][2];
00114     if (arg > 1.0) arg=1.0;
00115     if (arg < -1.0) arg=-1.0;
00116     *b = acos(arg);
00117     *c = atan2(R[1][2], -R[0][2]);
00118     
00119     if (fabs(R[1][2]) > fabs(R[0][2])) {
00120       if ((0.0 > sin(*b)*sin(*c)) != (0.0 > R[1][2])) {
00121         *b = -(*b);
00122       }
00123     } else {
00124       if ((0.0 > sin(*b)*cos(*c)) != (0.0 > -R[0][2])) {
00125         *b = -(*b);
00126       }
00127     }
00128   }
00129 
00130   // return alpha, gamma [0, 2Pi], beta [0,Pi]
00131   if (*a < 0.0) *a += 2*M_PI;
00132   if (*c < 0.0) *c += 2*M_PI;
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 static double det(double R[3][3])
00137 {
00138   return (R[0][0]*R[1][1]*R[2][2] + R[0][1]*R[1][2]*R[2][0] + 
00139           R[0][2]*R[1][0]*R[2][1] - R[0][0]*R[1][2]*R[2][1] - 
00140           R[0][1]*R[1][0]*R[2][2] - R[0][2]*R[1][1]*R[2][0]);
00141 }

00144 
00145 void calcSpatialOrientation(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00146                             double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00147 {
00148   double T[3][3];
00149 
00150   calcInertiaTensor(Q, X, T);
00151 
00152   char JOBZ='V';
00153   char UPLO='U';
00154   int N=3;
00155   double W[3];
00156   double WORK[15];
00157   int LWORK=15;
00158   int INFO;
00159 
00160   FORTRAN(dsyev)(&JOBZ, &UPLO, &N, (double*)T, &N, W, WORK, &LWORK, &INFO);
00161 
00162   // align supposed symmetry axis with z axis
00163 
00164   int i;
00165   double maxe=0.0;
00166 
00167   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00168     maxe = fmax(maxe, fabs(W[i]));
00169 
00170   double dif[3], mindif = 1.0;
00171   int imin=-1;
00172 
00173   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00174     dif[i] = fabs(W[(i+1)%3]-W[(i+2)%3])/maxe;
00175     if (dif[i] < mindif) {
00176       mindif = dif[i];
00177       imin = i;
00178     }
00179   }
00180 
00181   // align z-axis with symmetry axis
00182   double dummy;
00183   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00184     dummy = T[2][i];
00185     T[2][i] = T[imin][i];
00186     T[imin][i] = dummy;
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (det(T) < 0.0)
00190     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00191       T[0][i] *= -1;
00192 
00193 
00194   RotationMatrixToEulerAngles(T, alpha, beta, gamma);
00195 }
00196 
00197 
00198 void calcOrientedOrientation(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00199                              double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00200 {
00201   double T[3][3];
00202   double O[3][3][3];
00203   int i,j,k;
00204 
00205   calcInertiaTensor(Q, X, T);
00206   calcOctupoleTensor(Q, X, O);
00207 
00208   char JOBZ='V';
00209   char UPLO='U';
00210   int N=3;
00211   double W[3];
00212   double WORK[15];
00213   int LWORK=15;
00214   int INFO;
00215 
00216   FORTRAN(dsyev)(&JOBZ, &UPLO, &N, (double*)T, &N, W, WORK, &LWORK, &INFO);
00217 
00218   // axis with smallest eigenvalue to become z axis
00219 
00220   int imin=0;
00221   double minw=fabs(W[0]);
00222 
00223   for (i=1; i<3; i++)
00224     if (fabs(W[i]) < minw) {
00225       imin = i;
00226       minw = fabs(W[i]);
00227     }
00228 
00229   // align z-axis with symmetry axis
00230   double dummy;
00231   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00232     dummy = T[2][i];
00233     T[2][i] = T[imin][i];
00234     T[imin][i] = dummy;
00235   }
00236 
00237   // we want a pure rotation
00238   if (det(T) < 0.0)
00239     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00240       T[0][i] *= -1;
00241 
00242   // inertia tensor is invariant under Ry(180deg)
00243   // use sign of octupole moment to select orientation 
00244   double Ozzz = 0.0;
00245   
00246   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00247     for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00248       for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00249         Ozzz += T[2][i]*T[2][j]*T[2][k]*O[i][j][k];
00250 
00251   fprintf(stderr, "... Ozzz: %8.5f\n", Ozzz);
00252 
00253   // Ry(180deg)
00254   if (Ozzz < 0.0) {
00255     for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00256       T[0][i] *= -1;
00257       T[2][i] *= -1;
00258     }
00259   }
00260 
00261   RotationMatrixToEulerAngles(T, alpha, beta, gamma);
00262 }
00263 
00264 
00266 void calcSpinOrientation(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00267                          double* alpha, double* beta, double* gamma)
00268 {
00269   double J[3];
00270 
00271   calcJ(Q, X, J);
00272 
00273   double Jxy=sqrt(J[0]*J[0]+J[1]*J[1]);
00274   double J2=sqrt(J[0]*J[0]+J[1]*J[1]+J[2]*J[2]);
00275 
00276   *alpha = (J[1] > 0.0 ? +1 : -1)* acos(J[0]/Jxy);
00277   *beta = acos(J[2]/J2);
00278   *gamma = 0.0;
00279 }
